name: bluepages
description: Ethereum address and Twitter/Farcaster identity lookups via Bluepages.fyi. Provides an MCP server with 10 tools for single/batch address lookups, streaming for large lists, and credit management. Also includes a /bluepages skill for guided workflows.

args: cd "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}" && [ -d node_modules ] || npm install --production --no-fund --no-audit >&2 && exec node mcp-server.js
